price: Ɛberε a adeε sa kataa ne soͻ no, ohunu nsoromma. Ɔkaa sε:” Woi ne me Wura no”. Ԑberε a εkͻtͻeε no ͻkaa sε: ‘’Mempε wͻn a wͻ’kͻtͻ’’.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَنَّ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلَّيۡلُ رَءَا كَوۡكَبٗاۖ قَالَ هَٰذَا رَبِّيۖ فَلَمَّآ أَفَلَ قَالَ لَآ أُحِبُّ ٱلۡأٓفِلِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falammā janna ʿalayhi al-laylu raā kawkaban qāla hādhā rabbī falammā afala qāla lā uḥibbu al-āfilīna
